name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, and **Microservices**. Proven expertise in building distributed systems and implementing robust backend solutions that enhance observability and monitoring using message brokers like **RabbitMQ**. Skilled in **infrastructure management** and developing applications that ensure high performance and reliability.
Solid foundation in AI/ML technologies, enabling predictive analytics and automation. Experience in deploying cloud-native systems and integrating CI/CD pipelines, ensuring seamless software delivery. Known for compliance-driven development, effectively aligning solutions with industry standards. Strong collaborative approach, bridging gaps between technical challenges and business solutions.
